scripts.as-build-dev: npm run --silent as-compile-dev && npm run --silent as-cp-glue
scripts.as-build-prd: npm run --silent clean:build npm run as-compile-prd && npm run --silent as-cp-glue
scripts.run-once: npm run --silent as-build-dev && npm run --silent tsnode ./src/index.ts
scripts.start: npm run --silent run-once && npm run --silent run-once &&  npm run --silent daemon ./src/index.ts
